name: White Drop on Android
description:
From a mini Pico-8 project, the game has finally arrived on Android!

The rule is extremely simple, try to control the droplet (which is not very pleasant to do) by touch and drag to avoid the obstacle platforms and earn as many scores as possible. 

The original White Drop came with minimalist graphics, plain white drop and platforms on black background, which is the reason why it was called White Drop.

We embrace that spirit and expand it. Now you can collect coins throughout the gameplay to unlock interesting skins. (Note that skins and hats are pure cosmetics don't affect collision box)

Coins are not always spawned, the higher you score, the greater your chances of getting a coin spawned. And you also have a chance to encounter bonus level, which gives more coins, but weirder pattern of platform spawning.

Enjoy and have fun!
